reviews.text: I had moussaka and it was excellent! Homemade, healthy and tasty food. The restaurant is very cosy and the waiter, so friendly. I highly recommend this restaurant. Something different in Helsinki.

Had the shared starter plate for two and it was delicious. The paper lamb and seafood pasta were both excellent as well. Service was prompt and friendly and overall had a great birthday dinner. Will visit again soon üòã

Quite a nice play to dine. Nice food and vibe. The foods are interesting as all Mediterranean foods are. The quality can be a tad higher with the meat themselvea. I took the lamb and others took the beef filled with feta cheese. I tasted the beef aswell and I liked the flavours better. Portions are good. The waiter didn't write things down so the food delivery was not smooth as he forgot who ordered what. However, they greeted and treated us nicely. Didn't try the pasta myslef but everyone were happy with the food. We also tried some baklava, and one of us didn't want the ice cream so she got two baklavas, if I knew I would have definitely done the same üòÅ

This restaurant has nothing to do with Greek food, the prices are pure fantasy.
20 euros for a Greek salad that doesn't even include the ingredients a classic salad should have.
Souvlaki wasn't made with pork, only beef.

The waitress was very rude and didn't understand English, which resulted in one of us eating first while the rest of the group got their food about 20 minutes later.
They couldn't even consider offering something like a Coca-Cola as a small "compensation" for this.

Absolutely nothing I would recommend... pure disappointment, unfortunately.

The waitress just cleared the plates without asking how the food tasted or anything.

This is not Greek food in any way.

We went to Zorbas on my son's high school graduation day to have lunch. The restaurant opens on Saturday at 1pm. We had table booked at the same time. The restaurant was full by 1.30pm. Food was excellent. Service was excellent. Atmosphere was excellent. The restaurant has been in Helsinki for 43 years, so that already tells something. It was our first time there, but definitely the last. Highly recommend.
